articles.title: NIH conducts research in Colorado on long COVID - FOX31 Denver
articles.description: Millions of Americans may be living with long COVID, and now the National Institutes of Health wants to learn how to prevent and treat the symptoms.» Subscri...

articles.title: Biden angers China with vow to defend Taiwan - News24
articles.description: President Joe Biden that US forces would defend Taiwan militarily if China attempted to take control of the island by force, prompting Beijing to warn that America was "playing with fire."
articles.content:
• President Joe Biden has compared China's threat to self-ruled Taiwan to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
  • Beijing has recently intensified military pressure on Taiwan.
